content:
As soon as your fingers brush across the surface of the seed, you're struck with a single, all-consuming thought: You must protect this seed. Even as you snatch up the spherical object and cradle it protectively in your arms, visions dance through your mind. You see the endless green expanse of the Verdessa. Then a towering, blue-white column … Wait, that's Tumbledown Falls. As soon as you recognize it, you're filled with certainty of purpose—you must take the seed to the Cerulean Curtain.

A) Help the seed. Discard all   from the Seed and attach the HELPING HAND mission to it. You must bring the Seed to the Cerulean Curtain to help it.

B) No … actually, why don't you help the seed? Discard all   from the Seed and attach the HELPING HAND mission to it. You must bring the Seed to the Cerulean Curtain to help it.
